divs: sighting detailsi spotted the same black triangle as reported by someone else over gonzales, louisiana. i tried to film it before it left the area. the video of the triangle isn't that great, but i caught another ufo high above and have it disappearing\cloaking\shutting down its lights on film. also they were in the area again on august 5th, but couldn't get anything on film.
Summary: Black Triangle UFO seen same night as other witness on mufon
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Gonzales
There were 2 other sightings in Gonzales on or around August 4th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
